metadata.title: Tagline Canister Filter-Thread Size:3/4" NPT-Screen:100 Micron
description: Amiad TAGLINE filters are made for wide range of irrigation applications. The TAGLINE filters are available in various filtration degrees to cover the needs of modern irrigation systems. TAGLINE filters are made from high quality engineered plastic materials providing excellent mechanical strength, durability and ease of installation.Amiads TAGLINE filters are easy to maintain; no tools are needed for extracting the filter element from thefilter housing for rinsing.Features:The screen elements are constructed of molded plastic ribs thatsupport a stainless steel weave-wire for a filtration range of 80 or 100 micron.The direction of flow in the screen elements is from the inside out.Suspended solids accumulate on the inner side of the screen.The screen can be easily extracted from the filter housing formanual rinsing.The screen elements are designed for creating very low head loss,retention of organic substances and are especially suitable forseparating inorganic particles.The screen cylinder incorporates two O-rings to ensure perfect sealing inside the filter housing. 3/4"1"1 1/2"Maximum Flow Rate 13.2 GPM22 GPM66 GPMMax Working Pressure120 PSI120 PSI120 PSIMax Working Temp60C (140F) 60C (140F)60C (140F)Filtration Degrees80 Micron = 200 Mesh80 Micron = 200 Mesh80 Micron = 200 Mesh100 Micron = 155 Mesh100 Micron = 155 Mesh100 Micron = 155 MeshEmpty Weight.35 lbs.37 lbs2.2 lbs
